properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 29 at 3:03AM MST until March 2 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
...Winter Storm Watches Posted for Portions of Central and
Southern Wyoming late tonight through Sunday evening...

.Snow will develop late tonight and continue through the day
Sunday. The snow is likely to persist across southern Wyoming
Sunday evening. The combination of snow and wind could create
hazardous travel in some locations.

* WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches possible in
combination with gusty northeast wind of 25 to 35 mph.

* WHERE...East Sweetwater County.

* WHEN...From Sunday morning through late Sunday night.

* IMPACTS...The combination of snow and wind is likely to
produce reduced visibility and hazardous travel conditions for
motorists along Interstate 80.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to fall
from late Sunday morning through Sunday evening.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT
